name: csrenato.github.io
description: Personal Website Based on JSON Resume
author: Renato Ćurić

scripts.previewEnglish: cp profile.png public | true && cp public/index.html index.html | true && resume serve -r resume/english.json -p 420 english
scripts.previewGerman: cp profile.png public | true && cp public/index.html index.html | true && resume serve -r resume/german.json -p 421 german
